ing: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
des: "This is a decadent cheese ball that showcases the flavors of feta cheese. It always gets rave reviews when I bring it to parties."
ins: Mix cream cheese, feta cheese, and butter together in a bowl using your hands; add black olives and green onions. Form mixture into a ball; sprinkle with almonds. Lightly press almonds into cheese ball. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
